name: Tempomate
description:
Mindless time tracking in Jira (Server) Tempo time sheets.

This extension allows you to log your time in Tempo with three mouse clicks or less.

In addition it can remind you frequently to log your time in case you didn't.

After installation, configure the extension with your Jira URL, user name, API token and a couple of JQL filters for the issue categories to show in the menu.

Only Jira Server is supported right now. Comment on https://github.com/dmfs/tempomate/issues/45 if you need Jira Cloud support.
